about_the_game:
Dive into the Ultimate Robot Showdown with Bot Beats
Unleash your inner coder, build epic robots, and conquer the arena. Whether you're new to coding or a seasoned pro, Bot Beats delivers fast-paced strategic action, powered by the joy of programming.

What You Can Expect from Bot Beats
Accessible to All: New to coding? No problem! Our drag-and-drop system lets you jump right into building bots. Advanced players can code in Python and Rust for deeper control and strategy.
Creative Freedom: Design and program bots your way. Customize your mechanical champions to reflect your unique style and tactics.
Instant Gratification: Watch your code come to life instantly! Tweak your bots, release them into battle, and see the sparks fly.
Non-Stop Entertainment: It’s all about the rush of combat, outsmarting opponents, and watching your bots dominate the battlefield. Coding has never been this fun!
Join Our Community: Connect with players of all skill levels, share strategies, compete in tournaments, and immerse yourself in the world of Bot Beats.

Still in Alpha – More to Come
Bot Beats is currently in its alpha stage, which means it’s still evolving. You may encounter a few quirks here and there, but it’s all part of the journey! We’re continuously adding new features, polishing gameplay, and making the robot battles even more intense.

Join the fun today! Whether you're here for quick matches or looking to create the ultimate mechanical masterpiece, Bot Beats is your gateway to endless excitement. Are you ready to code, compete, and conquer?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
